headline: Oil Tops $68 A Barrel As Iran Talks Deteriorate And Tensions Rise In The Middle East
summary: Oil prices advanced Thursday, trading above $68 per barrel as U.S.-Iran tensions appear to be rising.

headline: Oil Tops $67 A Barrel As Iran Talks Deteriorate And Tensions Rise In The Middle East
summary: Oil prices fell Thursday but still traded above $67 per barrel as U.S.-Iran tensions appear to be rising.

headline: Chevron and Halliburton Enable Intelligent Hydraulic Fracturing
summary: HOUSTON, June 12, 2025--Chevron U.S.A. Inc., a subsidiary of Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX), and Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) jointly developed a new process that enables closed-loop, feedback-driven completions in Colorado. This intelligent fracturing process combines automated stage execution with subsurface feedback to optimize delivery of energy into the wellbore without relying on human intervention. The capability enhances the previous implementation of autonomous hydraulic fracturing technolo

headline: Top Dividend Stocks To Consider In June 2025
summary: Over the last 7 days, the United States market has risen by 1.2%, contributing to an impressive 11% increase over the past year, with earnings anticipated to grow by 14% annually in the coming years. In this context of robust market performance and optimistic growth projections, identifying strong dividend stocks can be a strategic way for investors to potentially benefit from both income and capital appreciation.
